Capricious and always eager to share a good laugh, copper dragons are among the wiliest of the metallic dragons, but this by no means interferes with their mission to spread freedom in oppressive lands. Copper dragons are hedonists who are quick to indulge in simple pleasures, but they’re also sympathetic to other creatures, slow to pass judgment, and careful to always examine a situation from as many perspectives as possible. This philosophy has its drawbacks, however, as copper dragons are susceptible to negative influences and prone to forgiving the less serious evil acts performed by their chromatic cousins and other cruel creatures. Copper dragons also have a difficult time keeping their temper in check once they are roused to anger. Copper dragons tend to lair in warm or temperate hills, but due to their nature, they move their lairs every few years. They sometimes live among other people, especially any dwarves who reside nearby. Some copper dragons even worship gods typically worshipped only by humanoids. Among these dragons, worship of Cayden Cailean is most popular, as they see his love of freedom and penchant for alcohol aligning with the typical copper dragon mindset. A copper dragon’s combat tactics are as unorthodox as its sense of humor, as it is more likely to use mockery and tricks than outright strength to win its battles. As a copper dragon ages, it perfects jokes capable of rendering its foes helpless with laughter. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Ancient Copper Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=150) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 122 **Perception** +30; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +30, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +31, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +29, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +31, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +29, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +30 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +5 **Int** +6 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +6 --- **AC** 41 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +32 **Will** +32 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 345 **Immunities** acid, paralyzed, sleep **Frightful Presence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 35
**Slow Aura** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61)) 10 feet. Each creature that ends its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 37 Will saving throw or be slowed 1 for 1 round (or slowed 2 on a critical failure). The copper dragon can turn this aura on or off with a single action, which has the concentrate trait, and can choose not to affect allies within the aura.
**Twisting Tail** **Trigger** A creature within reach of the copper dragon’s tail uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it’s using. **Effect** The dragon makes a tail Strike at the creature with a –2 penalty. If it hits, the dragon disrupts the triggering action. --- **Speed** 50 feet, fly 200 feet; climb stone 50 feet **Melee** jaws +33 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+16 piercing plus 3d8 acid **Melee** claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+16 slashing **Melee** tail +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+14 bludgeoning **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 39 - **1st** [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140) (at will) - **4th** [Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276) (at will) - **5th** [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150) (at will), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) **Breath Weapon** The copper dragon breathes in one of two ways. The dragon can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
  • **Acid** ([acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)); The dragon breathes acid in a 100-foot line that deals 18d6 acid damage (DC 38 basic Fortitude save).
  • **Slowing Gas** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)); The dragon breathes a 100-foot line of slowing gas. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 38 Fortitude save or be [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) 1 for 1 round (or slowed 2 on a critical failure).
**Climb Stone** The dragon's climb speed functions only when climbing stone surfaces. **Draconic Frenzy** The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order. **Draconic Momentum** When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges Breath Weapon. **Mass Laughter** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day. **Effect** The copper dragon tells a fantastic joke. Each creature in a 100-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 39 Will save or suffer the effects of a 9th-level [_hideous laughter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=150) spell for 1 minute.
Copper Dragon Spellcasters Copper dragon spellcasters tend to cast the following spells. **Young Copper Dragon**
**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 27, attack +20; **3rd** [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_meld into stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=188); **2nd** [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271); **1st** [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [_magic aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=178); **Cantrips (3rd)** [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) **Adult Copper Dragon**
**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 33, attack +26; As young copper dragon, plus **5th** [_false vision_](/Spells.aspx?ID=109), [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340); **4th** [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [_creation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=54), [_stoneskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=312); **Cantrips (5th)** [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) **Ancient Copper Dragon**
**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 39, attack +33; As adult copper dragon, plus **8th** [_maze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [_prismatic wall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=234); **7th** [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [_project image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=237), [_reverse gravity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=261); **6th** [_mislead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=199), [_phantasmal calamity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338); **Cantrips (8th)** [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
Rokiere Considered humorless for a copper dragon, Rokiere keeps her lair in the hills on Motaku Isle in the Shackles. It’s rumored that she knows where vast amounts of nearby treasure are located, and she will divulge the location of this hidden wealth to anyone who can make her laugh.
name: Ancient Copper Dragon
